  • test_phonons
  • View page source

test_phonons

Comprehensive test suite for phonons.py module.

Tests all phonon interaction functions including initialization, many-body phonon-electron/hole interactions, distribution functions, and utility functions.

Attributes

hbar

kB

pi

ii

Classes

TestInitializePhonons

Test phonon module initialization.

TestMBPE

Test many-body phonon-electron interaction.

TestMBPH

Test many-body phonon-hole interaction.

TestCq2

Test Cq2 function.

TestFermiDistr

Test Fermi-Dirac distribution function.

TestBoseDistr

Test Bose-Einstein distribution function.

TestN00

Test N00 function.

TestIntegratedWorkflows

Test integrated workflows combining multiple functions.

TestEdgeCases

Test edge cases and boundary conditions.

TestNumericalPrecision

Test numerical precision and stability.

class test_phonons.TestInitializePhonons

Test phonon module initialization.

setup_method()

Set up test fixtures.

test_InitializePhonons_small_array()

Test InitializePhonons with small array.

test_InitializePhonons_array_shapes()

Test that initialized arrays have correct shapes.

test_InitializePhonons_transpose_relationship()

Test that EPT and HPT are transposes of EP and HP.

test_InitializePhonons_idel_matrix()

Test that idel matrix has zeros on diagonal.

test_InitializePhonons_EP_values()

Test that EP matrix has correct structure.

test_InitializePhonons_HP_values()

Test that HP matrix has correct structure.

test_InitializePhonons_NO_calculation()

Test that NO (Bose distribution) is calculated correctly.

test_InitializePhonons_Vscale_calculation()

Test that Vscale is calculated correctly.

test_InitializePhonons_different_temperatures()

Test InitializePhonons with different temperatures.

test_InitializePhonons_different_frequencies()

Test InitializePhonons with different phonon frequencies.

class test_phonons.TestMBPE

Test many-body phonon-electron interaction.

setup_method()

Set up test fixtures.

test_MBPE_initializes_outputs()

Test that MBPE initializes outputs correctly.

test_MBPE_finite_values()

Test that MBPE produces finite values.

test_MBPE_non_negative()

Test that MBPE produces non-negative rates.

test_MBPE_adds_to_existing_values()

Test that MBPE adds to existing Win/Wout values.

test_MBPE_zero_population()

Test MBPE with zero electron population.

test_MBPE_full_population()

Test MBPE with full electron population.

test_MBPE_different_array_sizes()

Test MBPE with different array sizes.
